text: Peter John Joseph Murphy (born 11 July 1957) is an English singer-songwriter, and musician. He was the vocalist of the goth rock band Bauhaus. His best known albums were Love Hysteria, Deep, and Holy Smoke. He is known as the Godfather of Goth". In August 2019, Murphy was hospitalized for a heart attack in New York City. ==References== Category:1957 births Category:Living people Category:English rock singers Category:English rock guitarists Category:British keyboardists Category:People from Northampton Category:Bauhaus (band)
title: Peter Murphy (musician)
